action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
DESCRIPTION: 5x5 grid. The first four rows have a blank (▢) in the first column and filled (X) in columns 2-5. The fifth row is entirely blank (▢).

This is my DESCRIPTION: 5x5 grid. The first four rows have a blank (▢) in the first column and filled (X) in columns 2-5. The fifth row is entirely blank (▢).
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Does the fifth row contain exactly five blank cells (▢▢▢▢▢)?

This is my DESCRIPTION: 5x5 grid. The first four rows each start with a blank (▢) followed by four Xs. The fifth row is entirely blank (▢▢▢▢▢).
QUESTION: Does the fifth row contain exactly five blank cells (▢▢▢▢▢)? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Does column 2 contain exactly four Xs?

ANSWER: Yes
